comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
The caption here with this photo is incorrect, this is not a "Ryan monoplane," but the ill-fated Tremaine Humming Bird, built for the deadly Dole Air Race prize flight from Oakland, California to Honolulu, Hawaii.  

While the Mahoney-Ryan X-1 (X7621) Special "Sportster" was a monoplane, it differed considerably from the aircraft photographed above in that it had tandem cockpit bays (as opposed to the cabin above) and much more robust landing gear.

Here is a photo of the Mahoney-Ryan X-1 in the SDASM photostream:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4831962215/in/photostream/]
